investmentPO.investmentSkipDetails: If you skip this step your contributions will go into a default fund chosen by your employer. You'll have the option to change this fund once you're enrolled.
investmentPO.investmentSkipQuestion: Are you sure you want to skip selecting an investment fund?

beneficiariesDescription.item: You can decide what will happen to your savings after you die by designating one or more beneficiaries. If you don't designate a beneficiary or none of them survive you, the money will automatically go to your estate, unless the law requires otherwise. Generally, you can change your beneficiaries at any time after enrolment using your online account.
